title: Good Logo references links?
content:
Hi all,   
   
I am looking for some websites that have images of many logos and logotypes, especially those with a sports or racing feel. Contemporary or vintage are both good. Thanks!   
   
-Apo
author: apocalypso

comments.content:
[http://web.brandsoftheworld.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053010/http:/web.brandsoftheworld.com/)   
   
This is the site that is most referenced, lots of luck

Tif,   
Your first link has an add that promises. "If don't have a logo, get one here for only $9.95"   
   
I think I work way too slow to make a living at the price :-)   
   
ChrisL

_\> Good Logo references links?_   
   
As the title ( and your question ) may suggest.: [www.goodlogo.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053010/http:/www.goodlogo.com/).. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053010im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

_A few more, even some sports related ones.: ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053010im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)_   
   
logoed ( [www.logoed.fsnet.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053010/http:/www.logoed.fsnet.co.uk/) )   
SportLogo ( [www.sportlogo.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053010/http:/www.sportlogo.net/) )   
CCs Sports Logos ( [www.sportslogos.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053010/http:/www.sportslogos.net/) )   
   
Blue Vertigo ( [www.bluevertigo.com.ar](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053010/http:/www.bluevertigo.com.ar/) )   
_( Nice resource.. Scroll to the right for 'Logotypes'.. )_
